entities: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime (UNODC)
summary:
45. Recognizes the importance of voluntary, safe, and sustainable reintegration of Afghan refugees for stability.

46. Affirms the importance of voluntary, safe, and sustainable reintegration of internally displaced persons.

47. Notes the need to strengthen Afghanistan's absorption capacity for rehabilitation and reintegration of refugees and internally displaced persons.

48. Requests the Secretary-General to report to the Council every three months on developments in Afghanistan.

49. Decides to remain actively seized of the matter.
